channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump’s playbook may be tossed, but higher tariffs are here to stay — one way or another
item.description: Is Trump’s trade strategy in limbo? Yes, but ‘Tariff Man’ has options.

item.title: My life partner is 18 years my senior. He wants to leave his $4.5 million fortune to me — not his two kids. Do we tell them?
item.description: “No doubt they would feel the arrangement is unfair, and that would potentially end our relationship.”

item.title: My father-in-law has dementia and is moving in with us. Can we invoice him for a caregiver?
item.description: “Do we have an obligation to provide my wife’s troubled sibling with an accounting of my father-in-law’s expenses?”

item.title: My friend is getting divorced. Her husband kindly said, ‘Take the house.’ Is there a catch?
item.description: “After my friend said that perhaps she’ll just settle for the house, her husband agreed and moved to file for divorce quickly.”

item.title: My husband and I earn $115K. We’re inheriting $300K. Should we invest in real estate or stock?
item.description: “We have $40,000 in credit-card debt and two financed vehicles with $100,000 in debt combined.”

item.title: Analysts stay upbeat on Costco after solid quarter, but say it's richly valued
item.description: Shares have climbed more than 14% so far in 2025 compared with a small decline for the S&P 500.

item.title: Morgan Stanley says buy these five stocks soon that are set to rally
item.description: Morgan Stanley named five stocks that have plenty of room to run.

item.title: These stocks are overbought after a strong May for Wall Street and could be due for a pullback
item.description: CNBC Pro identified the most overbought and oversold stocks on Wall Street by looking at their 14-day relative strength index, or RSI, using LSEG data...

item.title: Charts show stocks could be in trouble as a new month of trading arrives, says Carter Worth
item.description: The May rally could be in trouble as a new month of trading approaches.

item.title: Morningstar named this dividend fund one of the best. Where its manager sees opportunity right now
item.description: Capital Group portfolio manager Christopher Buchbinder often finds opportunities where others see none. Here is where he is investing now.
